Image License Agreement

Archive-35 / The Restless Eye · Non-Exclusive Image License

1. Parties

This Image License Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between:

LICENSOR: Archive-35 / The Restless Eye, operated by Wolfgang Schram, Santa Clarita, California, USA ("Licensor", "Archive-35", "we", "us").

LICENSEE: The individual or entity identified at checkout ("Licensee", "you", "your"). By completing payment and checking the acceptance box, you agree to all terms below.

2. Definitions

  • "Image" means the specific photograph identified by its Archive-35 catalog number, as selected at time of purchase.
  • "License" means the non-exclusive, non-transferable right to use the Image as defined by the License Tier purchased.
  • "License Tier" means the specific usage category selected at checkout.
  • "License Period" means the duration of authorized use, as specified by the License Tier.
  • "Deliverable" means the high-resolution digital file(s) provided upon purchase.

3. Grant of License

Subject to the terms of this Agreement and full payment of the License Fee, Licensor grants Licensee a non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Image solely for the purposes specified by the purchased License Tier.

TierPermitted UsesDurationGeographyMax Users
Web / SocialWebsite, blog, social media for single brand1 yearWorldwide5
EditorialMagazine, newspaper, book, documentary1 yearWorldwide5
Commercial PrintBrochures, catalogs, packaging, trade shows2 yearsWorldwide10
Billboard / OOHOutdoor advertising, building wraps, transit, digital signage1 yearWorldwide10
HospitalityHotels, offices, healthcare (reproduced for multiple rooms)PerpetualWorldwideUnlimited
ExclusiveAll uses. Image removed from marketplace.2-5 yearsWorldwideUnlimited

The License is limited to the specific tier purchased. Any use beyond the permitted scope requires a separate license or tier upgrade.

For Exclusive licenses: upon payment confirmation, Licensor will remove the Image from the licensing gallery within 48 hours and provide written confirmation.

4. Restrictions

Licensee shall NOT:

  • Resell, sub-license, lease, or redistribute the Image or any derivative thereof
  • Make the raw file available for download by third parties
  • Use the Image in connection with any competing photography licensing service or stock photography platform
  • Use the Image for AI training, machine learning datasets, or generative AI model development
  • Use the Image in a defamatory, obscene, illegal, or misleading context
  • Use the Image to imply endorsement by the photographer without written consent
  • Remove, alter, or obscure any metadata or watermarks embedded in the Image
  • Claim authorship or copyright ownership of the Image

5. Intellectual Property

All intellectual property rights, including copyright, in the Image remain exclusively with the Licensor. This Agreement does not transfer ownership.

Licensee may make reasonable modifications (cropping, color correction, compositing) for the permitted use, provided such modifications do not misrepresent the original work.

6. Attribution

For Editorial use: attribution is REQUIRED. Credit line: "Photo: The Restless Eye / Archive-35" or "Photo: Wolfgang Schram / Archive-35"

For all other tiers: attribution is requested but not mandatory.

7. Payment & Delivery

The License Fee is due in full at time of purchase via Stripe. Upon confirmed payment, Licensee receives: (a) a secure, time-limited download link (valid 72 hours), (b) a License Certificate PDF with unique License ID, and (c) file specifications.

File formats: JPEG included by default. TIFF available for an additional $100 surcharge.

8. Term & Termination

This Agreement is effective from the date of purchase and continues for the License Period. Upon expiration, Licensee must cease all new uses. Existing published uses may remain but may not be reprinted or redeployed.

Licensor may terminate immediately upon written notice if Licensee breaches any material term.

9. Warranties & Indemnification

Licensor warrants that it is the sole copyright owner and the grant of this license does not infringe third-party rights.

Licensor does NOT warrant that the Image is free of recognizable persons, trademarks, or property requiring separate clearance. Licensee is solely responsible for obtaining any required releases.

10. Limitation of Liability

Licensor's total liability shall not exceed the License Fee paid. Licensor shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages.

11. Liquidated Damages

Unauthorized use constitutes infringement. The parties agree to liquidated damages of TWO TIMES (2x) the applicable License Fee for unauthorized use, in addition to any other remedies available at law.

12. Governing Law & Disputes

Governed by the laws of the State of California, USA. Disputes shall first be submitted to mediation; if mediation fails, binding arbitration in Los Angeles County. The prevailing party is entitled to reasonable attorneys' fees.

13. General Provisions

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement. Any modification must be in writing. If any provision is found unenforceable, the remainder remains in full force.

BY COMPLETING PAYMENT, LICENSEE ACKNOWLEDGES READING, UNDERSTANDING, AND AGREEING TO ALL TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT.
